title: Why do Sona, Karma, and Morgana get free poke? How is that balanced?

replies.body: A Laughing Fish gameplay post? Regardless, how do these three champs have free poke?

They don't even have to aim. Just click a button. Do you know how annoying it is to be playing ADC, and losing because someone just clicked on you and dealt high damage with a point-and-click or autoaim ability?
im just here to see how many people will take the bait

laughing fish gameplay posts are the best

What do you mean "free"?
Sona has to go in AA range,
Karma has to hit a decently hard skillshot or spend her mantra to make it easier
and Morgana has a skillshot or laughable puddle damage.

How is that better/worse than other botlane mages/enchanters/stuff?
I just hate it when I am playing as an ADC, and suddenly I am being hit with automatic aiming, high damage attacks.

> I just hate it when I am playing as an ADC, and suddenly I am being hit with automatic aiming, high damage attacks.

Oh I get it the irony of a ADC complaining about unavoidable high damage attacks. Because you know auto attacks are just that.
Forgot Lux.
She has to aim skill shots, she is fine
Um...yeah "Aim" her E. As long as you are within 1000 range it is undodgeable...they need to make it more like gragas Q that only does more dmg the longer it is up so you can't insta proc it.
Nah Lux is weak enough already
so do morg and karma, sona is the only one who has auto hit abilities.
Honestly hers are so weak it barely matters, her real damage is her chord auto.
Most  champions  can free poke.
It is different lol
People are missing the troll
{{champion:48}}
I believe this is what we call a troll.
I just dislike it when I am playing ADC, and I get chunked down by an undodgeable attack

I agree that Sona's needs toned down some because off her passive being retardedly broken early game, but Karma and Morgana are also suppose to operate as mid-laners so it was built into their kits. 
It's not really free either, they do cost good amounts of mana if spammed (I use both of them so I know their mana requirements). In addition, both of their good forms of poke (their Qs) are blockable by minions so you need to play the creep wave and if unable pay attention to their positioning enough to dodge them.
Automatically aiming high damage attacks are obnoxious to face as an ADC

It's not like they're target spells, watch where they move to and move out of the way. 
If one of them goes into the bush, you move toward the river, if they move toward the river you move toward the bush but not to far to pin yourself against the wall.

Oh no not the massively damaging morgana puddle
well shit the lane's already over :^)
Clearly you haven't faced Morg this season
It is decent once you have 3 points in it and they are already at half health!
I saw the thread, looked at the poster and now I'm just surfing the comments and enjoying the show.
by destroying them
